author: Kiley W.
description: A cog that automatically deletes specific commands after 1 second to clean up the channel.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the CmdCleaner cog. This cog helps keep your channel clean by removing certain commands after a short delay.
short: Automatically deletes specified commands after 1 second.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data. It only deletes messages that match specified commands.
